description: Lists an inventory of all the direct query data sources that you have configured within Amazon OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Send the request again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: DirectQueryDataSources
nested_items.description: A list of the direct query data sources that are returned by the ListDirectQueryDataSources API operation.

nested_items.name: DataSourceName
nested_items.description: A unique, user-defined label to identify the data source within your OpenSearch Service environment.

nested_items.name: DataSourceType
nested_items.description: The supported Amazon Web Services service that is used as the source for direct queries in OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLog
nested_items.description: Specifies CloudWatch Logs as a type of data source for direct queries.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the IAM role that grants OpenSearch Service permission to access the specified data source.

nested_items.name: SecurityLake
nested_items.description: Specifies Security Lake as a type of data source for direct queries.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the IAM role that grants OpenSearch Service permission to access the specified data source.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description that provides additional context and details about the data source.

nested_items.name: OpenSearchArns
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) for the OpenSearch collections that are associated with the direct query data source.

nested_items.name: DataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The unique, system-generated identifier that represents the data source.

nested_items.name: TagList
nested_items.description: A list of tags attached to a direct query data source.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the domain to which they are attached.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.
